BuiltInRoles.Name: Admins
BuiltInRoles.Description: Can do everything that Managers can. Also, an Admin can create other Admin, Developer or Manager accounts. This role has no development access, but can administer settings and apply updates to the system

BuiltInRoles.Name: Citizen Developers
BuiltInRoles.Description: Creates the application screens and the business logic/flows associated with them

BuiltInRoles.Name: Low-Code Engineer
BuiltInRoles.Description: Can do everything a Citizen Developer can in addition to having access to more advanced coding actions and application settings

BuiltInRoles.Name: Managers
BuiltInRoles.Description: Has access to all data stored in the system. Can manage all users except Admins and Citizen Developers

AppRoles.Name: Help Agents
AppRoles.Description: Agents can open new requests on behalf of users and are assigned requests opened by users.

AppRoles.Name: Users
AppRoles.Description: The normal users of this App
